articles.title: Parts of Boston Harbor meet shellfish consumption standards for first time in 100 years, state says
articles.description:
The state's Division of Marine Fisheries is in the process of reclassifying parts of the outer Boston Harbor so that shellfish will be allowed for direct human consumption.

articles.title: At Middlebury, she hoped to start fresh. In Trump’s America, it seemed impossible.
articles.description:
Lia Smith was a senior at Middlebury College, a transgender woman, and for a time, an athlete on the school’s diving team. But she struggled to feel accepted, and in October, she took her own life.
